official_title: A bill to direct the Secretary of the Army to renew the license of the Ira D. MacLachlan Post Numbered 3, the American Legion, Sault Sainte Marie, Michigan, to use a certain parcel of land.

summary.text: Directs the Secretary of the Army to renew the license of a named American Legion post in Michigan to use a certain parcel of land.
